param.name: uuid
param.doc: Unique id of the object to update

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Update a specific snmp object. This can only be used to update the existing object; it cannot be used to create new ones.

request.doc:
PUT https://{appliance_hostname}/rsp_snmp_objs/{uuid} Content-Type:application/json { "trapAddress": "4.4.4.4", "trapPort": 162, "trapCommunity": null, "trapVersion": "V3", "trapNotificationType": "inform", "userName": "testuser1", "authEnabled": true, "authType": "SHA", "authPassPhrase": "password", "privEnabled": true, "privType": "DES", "privPassPhrase": "password", "informSnmpEngineID": null, "informTimeout": 240, "name": "snmpTestObject_new", "objType": "snmp", "comment": "This is an updated test snmp V3 object"
}

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Request is in JSON formatting

param.name: trapAddress
param.doc: SNMP Trap host configuration

param.name: trapPort
param.doc: SNMP Trap port configuration

param.name: trapCommunity
param.doc: SNMP Trap Community String helps device decide whether to process or not

param.name: trapVersion
param.doc: SNMP Trap Protocol version, options V1,V2,V3

param.name: trapNotificationType
param.doc: Supported for V3 only, allowed values are Inform or Trap

param.name: authEnabled
param.doc: Authentication can be enabled or disabled to SNMP Trap

param.name: username
param.doc: Authentication username details to connect to SNMP trap

param.name: authPassPhrase
param.doc: Authentication passphrase details to connect to SNMP trap

param.name: authType
param.doc: Authentication types allowed are SHA or MD5 to connect to SNMP trap

param.name: privEnabled
param.doc: Encryption can be enabled or disabled to SNMP Trap

param.name: privPassPhrase
param.doc: Encryption passphrase details to connect to SNMP trap

param.name: privType
param.doc: Encryption types allowed are AES or DES to connect to SNMP trap

param.name: informSnmpEngineID
param.doc: EngineID of the application sending SNMP trap

param.name: informTimeout
param.doc: If acknowledgment is not received within the inform timeout inform notification is re-sent

param.name: name
param.doc: Name of the object

param.name: objType
param.doc: Type of the object (always "snmp")

param.name: comment
param.doc: Comment which describes the object

response.doc:
200 OK Content-Type:application/json { "trapAddress": "4.4.4.4", "trapPort": 162, "trapCommunity": null, "trapVersion": "V3", "trapNotificationType": "inform", "userName": "testuser1", "authEnabled": true, "authType": "SHA", "authPassPhrase": "password", "privEnabled": true, "privType": "DES", "privPassPhrase": "password", "informSnmpEngineID": null, "informTimeout": 240, "name": "snmpTestObject_new", "objType": "snmp", "comment": "This is an updated test snmp V3 object"
}

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: Specified object can not be found

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
